00018 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 // Function: ColorBox()
00020 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 ColorBox::ColorBox(QSize const& size, QWidget* parent) : QFrame(parent), textLabel_(0)
00022 {
00023     setLineWidth(1);
00024     setFrameStyle(QFrame::Box | QFrame::Plain);
00025     setAutoFillBackground(true);
00026     setFixedSize(size);
00027 
00028     color_ = palette().color(backgroundRole());
00029 
00030     textLabel_ = new QLabel(this);
00031     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00032     layout->addWidget(textLabel_, 1, Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter);
00033 }
00034

00036 // Function: ~ColorBox()
00037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 ColorBox::~ColorBox()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 // Function: setColor()
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 void ColorBox::setColor(QColor const& color)
00046 {
00047     QPalette pal = palette();
00048     pal.setColor(backgroundRole(), color);
00049     setPalette(pal);
00050 
00051     color_ = color;
00052 }
00053 
00054 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // Function: getColor()
00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 QColor const& ColorBox::getColor() const
00058 {
00059     return color_;
00060 }
00061 
00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00064 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 void ColorBox::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
00066 {
00067     QFrame::mousePressEvent(event);
00068 
00069     if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00070     {
00071         emit clicked();
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // Function: setText()
00077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void ColorBox::setText(QString const& text)
00079 {
00080     textLabel_->setText(text);
00081 }
00082 
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // Function: setTextFont()
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 void ColorBox::setTextFont(QFont const& font)
00087 {
00088     textLabel_->setFont(font);
00089 }
00090 
00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: setTextColor()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void ColorBox::setTextColor(QColor const& color)
00095 {
00096     QPalette pal = textLabel_->palette();
00097     pal.setColor(textLabel_->foregroundRole(), color);
00098     textLabel_->setPalette(pal);
00099 }
